Text: Songs From The Trees (A Musical Memoir Collection) is singer-songwriter Carly Simon's sixth greatest-hits album.

Triplets:<Carly Simon
3:
Text: Songs from the Trees:  The collection also includes two previously unreleased songs, "Showdown" (originally recorded during the sessions for her 1978 album "Boys in the Trees") and "I Can’t Thank You Enough", a brand new song written with her son Ben Taylor.
Triplets:<Ben Taylor
